ResearchProjectDef.label: Hypertech Starships
ResearchProjectDef.description: Construct the structural and supportive elements of a corellian starship.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Turbolaser
ResearchProjectDef.description: Add turbolaser turrets to your star ships for ship-to-ship combat. They run on tibanna gas.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Laser Cannon
ResearchProjectDef.description: Add laser cannon turrets to your star ships for ship-to-ship combat. They run on tibanna gas. They are less powerful, but they have a point-defense function.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Torpedo Launcher
ResearchProjectDef.description: Add torpedo launchers to your star ships for ship-to-ship combat. You can load up to 20 proton torpedos.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Star Fighter (Turrets)
ResearchProjectDef.description: Add star fighters to your star ships for ship-to-ship combat. They function like the other turrets.

ResearchProjectDef.label: CEC - Civilian
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build CEC civilian star ships with preformed ship parts. A set of ion engines is provided for each ship. These can be used in orbit.

ResearchProjectDef.label: CEC - Clone Wars Retrofit
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build CEC retrofited star ships with preformed ship parts. A set of ion engines is provided for each ship. These can be used in orbit.

ResearchProjectDef.label: CEC - Imperial Gozanti
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build two imperial gozanti-class cruisers with preformed ship parts. A set of ion engines is provided for each ship. These can be used in orbit.

ResearchProjectDef.label: CEC - CIS Gozanti
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build a CIS gozanti-class cruiser with preformed ship parts. A set of ion engines is provided for each ship. These can be used in orbit.

ResearchProjectDef.label: CEC - Armed
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build CEC armed star ships with preformed ship parts. A set of ion engines is provided for each ship. These can be used in orbit.

ResearchProjectDef.label: CEC - Freighters
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build CEC freighters with preformed ship parts. A set of ion engines is provided for each ship. These can be used in orbit.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Sienar Fleet Systems
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build Sienar Fleet Systems star ships with preformed ship parts. A set of ion engines is provided for each ship. These can be used in orbit.

ResearchProjectDef.label: KDY - Clone Wars
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build KDY clone wars star ships with preformed ship parts. A set of ion engines is provided for each ship. These can be used in orbit.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Victor Initiative Project
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build a victory-class star destroyer with preformed ship parts. A set of ion engines is provided for each ship. These can be used in orbit.

ResearchProjectDef.label: KDY - Early Empire
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build KDY early empire star ships with preformed ship parts. A set of ion engines is provided for each ship. These can be used in orbit.

ResearchProjectDef.label: KDY - Rebel Retrofit
ResearchProjectDef.description: Rebuild KDY early empire star ships with preformed ship parts. A set of ion engines is provided for each ship. These can be used in orbit.

ResearchProjectDef.label: KDY - Empire
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build KDY empire star ships with preformed ship parts. A set of ion engines is provided for each ship. These can be used in orbit.

ResearchProjectDef.label: KDY - Onager-Class Star Destroyer
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build an onager-class star destroyer with preformed ship parts. A set of ion engines is provided for each ship. These can be used in orbit.

ResearchProjectDef.label: KDY - Freighters
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build KDY freighters with preformed ship parts. A set of ion engines is provided for each ship. These can be used in orbit.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Sorosuub Corperation
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build Sorosuub Corperation star ships with preformed ship parts. A set of ion engines is provided for each ship. These can be used in orbit.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Rendili Stardrive
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build Rendili Stardrive star ships with preformed ship parts. A set of ion engines is provided for each ship. These can be used in orbit.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Hoersch-Kessel Drive Inc.
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build CIS star ships with preformed ship parts. A set of ion engines is provided for each ship. These can be used in orbit.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Free Dac Volunteers Engineering Corps
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build quarran CIS star ships with preformed ship parts. A set of ion engines is provided for each ship. These can be used in orbit.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Mega Ion Cannon
ResearchProjectDef.description: Add a mega ion cannon to your star ships for ship-to-ship combat. This functions like a spinal weapon. Should deactivate many parts of a star ship, but needs lots of power and time to cool down.
